Oh, my {} {} you occupy my every thought.
My dreams at night are filled with your sweet {} and your {}.
Oh so sweet they are, I pray my {} shan't ever rot.

You {} my dreams at night and are gone before the break of day.
I {} your {} and every little {} of yours,
My {} regard for you will never {} away.

Take these words, these feelings that I write
Make what you will of them, my {} {}
'Tis an ode to you, for you are my {} delight!
